name: Fractal (itch)
description:
The goal is getting as far as possible in a single run, but it won't easy. You must transform the hero into other shapes to overcome the obstacles. How far will you go?

A game by Jorge Moreno Aguilera (jorgemoag@gmail.com). Spring #ue4jam

THANK YOU SO MUCH FOR PLAYING MY GAME.

Controls:

Left mouse button or (A) gamepad button to transform to cube

Right mouse button or (B) gamepad button to transform to torus

Shift + Left mouse button or (X) gamepad button to transform to sphere

Shift + Right mouse button or (Y) gamepad button to transform to prisma

W or Up gamepad direction to sprint.

S or Down gamepad direction to slowmotion (limited).

Content that was created before the jam: 

All the models, materials, gameplay, shaders,code, etc., (all except the raw sounds) were made during the jam's timeframe.

Sounds from Soundly and Soniss GDC Audio bundle. Edited in Audacity.

Tools used: Houdini, 3D Studio Max, Unreal Engine, Photoshop, Substance, Audacity, Visual Studio.
